title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 692.7 - Disciplinary procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 692.7 - Disciplinary procedure

State Regulations
(a) Disciplinary proceedings against
any legal consultant shall be initiated and conducted in the same manner as
prescribed by law for disciplinary proceedings against attorneys. (b) Any committee authorized
by this court to conduct preliminary investigations of charges of professional
misconduct by attorneys shall have authority to conduct preliminary
investigations of charges of professional misconduct or unauthorized activities
on the part of any licensed legal consultant in the same manner as in
investigations relating to attorneys. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
692.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
